department.dept_long_name: Department of Molecular and Cellular Biology

course.title: Biochemistry of Membranes
course.description: A course on the properties of biological membranes, essential elements for cell individuality, communication between cells, and energy transduction. Topics include: membrane structure; membrane protein synthesis, insertion in the bilayer and targeting; transporters, pumps and channels; electron transport, H+ gradients and ATP synthesis; membrane receptors, G proteins and signal transduction; membrane fusion.
course.prerequisites: MCB 60 or MCB 52 and MCB 54 are recommended but not required.
